name: Liquid Elements
overview:
Liquid Elements is a small company, delivering tailor-made solutions on the field of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). This computer technique allows testing “virtual prototypes” of technical arrangements for they fluid or heat flow performances. Our offer is directed to companies involved in design of flow machines.

CFD methods allows optimization of modern engineering solutions through:

  • Foresight of quantitative results of testing of physical models for faster and better suiting products to one’s customers needs.
  • pokaz_obrazkow Improvements in products introduction by rapid prototyping and cost reduction.
  • Visualization of processes taking actions in flow machines.
